channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Equation Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Equation Editor

item.title: CVE-2018-0798|2024-09-16T18:56:12.217Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- equation%20editor
item.description: Equation Editor in Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Office 2010, Microsoft Office 2013, and Microsoft Office 2016 allows a remote code execution vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory, aka "Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability".

item.title: CVE-2018-0804|2024-09-16T17:09:15.719Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- equation%20editor
item.description: Equation Editor in Microsoft Office 2003, Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Office 2010, Microsoft Office 2013, and Microsoft Office 2016 allows a remote code execution vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory, aka "Microsoft Word Remote Code Execution Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0805, CVE-2018-0806, and CVE-2018-0807.

item.title: CVE-2018-0805|2024-09-16T16:18:21.090Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- equation%20editor
item.description: Equation Editor in Microsoft Office 2003, Microsoft Office 2007, Microsoft Office 2010, Microsoft Office 2013, and Microsoft Office 2016 allows a remote code execution vulnerability due to the way objects are handled in memory, aka "Microsoft Word Remote Code Execution Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0804, CVE-2018-0806, and CVE-2018-0807
